name: The Space Virus
description:
The Space Virus was made for Ludum Dare 42 in 72 hours and all assets was made from scratch. Theme: Running out of space

The Space Virus is a fun puzzle game that takes place in your computer. Your computer has somehow got a dangerous virus! The virus is downloading big files to make your computer run out of space. Delete as many files as you can before the virus gains complete control. Good luck player!

Tools used:

  • Unity: Personal Edition 2018.2.1
  • Bosca Ceoil
  • Bfxr
  • Piskel

Language: C#
